questions.question: A set of steps to solve a problem or perform a calculation is also known as ___.
Starting with a list then sequentially checking every item in the list for a search term is also known as a ___ search.
Starting with a sorted list then repeatedly halving the list to the portion that could contain the search term is also known as a ___ search.
questions.optionB: There is no exec() method in javascript
questions.optionC: To find a specific character within a string

questions.question: An example of ___ sort might be repeatedly scanning through a list of numbers, finding the smallest number, and moving it into its position in an array
